1891 | style="text-align:left;" | |} == Living Governors == So far, , , the eight living governors of Ceará are, in order of beginning of the first term: Adauto Bezerra, Gonzaga Mota, Tasso Jereissati, Ciro Gomes, Chico Aguiar, Lúcio Alcântara, Cid Gomes and Camilo Santana. == Links == * *VARNHAGEN, Francisco Adolpho de. Historia geral do Brazil (v. 2). E. and H. Laemmert, 1857 *:pt:Rita Krommen. Mathias Beck and the Cia. Of the West Indies. Fortaleza: UFC, 1994 * Ceará
